title: MineSweeper
description: Minesweeper game clean architecture, advanced game mechanics like real-time bomb counters, and recursive algorithms.

title: HPBsite
description: React, TypeScript, and Vite project featuring an interactive quiz, a Supabase-powered message wall, and a dynamic masonry grid of images/videos. Styled with Tailwind CSS and deployed on Vercel for seamless performance.

title: Reservation System
description: User authentication, account management, book search, and reservations, powered by a MySQL database and built using PHP, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Final project COSC213, in collaboration with Aslan Pereira.

title: Previous Portfolio
description: Showcased form validation, AJAX, resume, LinkedIn integration, WordPress, and project displays, built with HTML, CSS, PHP, and JavaScript. Personal project for presenting technical skills and previous work.
